title: Removing chars
body:
So far I keep levelling accounts just to collect the characters. I have one accounts with all chars and most skins and my alt account (this one) has too many chars and I would like to just remove all chars and start again instead of making a new account. As I get older I need less new accounts and just the ability to delete chars on this one.

Is it possible?

replies.body: why would anyone want to delete their characters?
I have lots of accounts and just want to start again without making a new account, I love earning IP champs but have them all too many times.

yeha thats okay, but what I'm trying to say is why would riot make such a thing? not many people would do that. but i guess its time to just make a new account or just maybe do it for a friend or something while they use your account idk, but i don't think riot has made deleting your champion a thing, would make hacking a account really bad cause they could delete all your champions you worked hard for.

if u after all the skins make a garena account and then buy the legacy skins as they still sell them in their shop, then transfer that account over to oce which I think you are still able to do and tada, an oce account with legacy skins on it
